tressider.text: You are standing at the enterence of Tressider. It is a beautiful day and students bike by on their way to class

west campus.text: You are in the FroSoCo qaud. A group of students sit under a tree working on their math 51 pset.

the coho.text: You are in the CoHo. A jazz band plays while people sip their coffee.

the main quad.text: You are standing in the main quad. One of the trees is blooming purple flowers. In the center of the quad is a locked tunnel enterance
